name: recommenderessay1
text: How long have you known the applicant?

name: recommenderessay2
text: In what capacity have you known the applicant?

name: recommenderessay3
text: If the applicant was a student in some of your classes, what were these subjects?

name: recommenderessay4
text: What do you  consider as the applicant's outstanding talents or strengths in realtion to gradute study?

name: recommenderessay5
text: What do you consider as his/her weakness or deficiencies in relation to graduate study?
